Uses of Class
gs.spri.raven.RavenServlet.Action

  • Packages that use RavenServlet.Action 
    Package Description
    gs.spri.raven
    High level classes to make use of the raven authentication service.

    • Uses of RavenServlet.Action in gs.spri.raven

      Subclasses of RavenServlet.Action in gs.spri.raven 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RavenServlet.MapAction
      An Action containing a Map of all the HTTP parameters from a request.
      Methods in gs.spri.raven that return RavenServlet.Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected RavenServlet.Action RavenServlet.parseRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
      Extracts from 'req' all information necessary for processing the request.
      Methods in gs.spri.raven with parameters of type RavenServlet.Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void RavenServlet.performAction(RavenServlet.Action a, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession ses, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
      Performs the specified Action and writes an appropriate response to 'res'.
      protected void RavenServlet.reportRavenAuthenticationException(RavenServlet.Action action, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res, RavenAuthenticationException cause)
      Called when authentication is not possible because a user could not be authenticated.
      protected void RavenServlet.reportRavenException(RavenServlet.Action action, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res, RavenException cause)
      Called when authentication is not possible because of a protocol error.
      protected void RavenServlet.reportRavenStateException(RavenServlet.Action action, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res, RavenStateException cause)
      Called when a token is received from Raven before the application has requested one.
      protected void RavenServlet.reportServletException(RavenServlet.Action action, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res, javax.servlet.ServletException cause)
      Called when a ServletException is thrown.
      protected boolean RavenServlet.requiresAuthentication(RavenServlet.Action a)
      Returns 'true' if 'a' requires authentication.
